title: Universal Basic Income and AI
description: A micro-lesson that makes Universal Basic Income and AI usable.

hook.text: If AI creates massive wealth but eliminates millions of jobs, who gets the money?

buildup.text: Universal Basic Income proposes giving every citizen a regular payment regardless of employment.

twist.text: Critics say UBI removes the incentive to work. Pilots show mixed but promising results.

climax.text: Sam Altman and Elon Musk both support UBI as a response to AI-driven job displacement.

punchline.text: If robots do the work, humans need a new social contract.
